verses.roman:
"ācāryera ei paiḍa, pānā-sara-pūpī
ei amṛta-guṭikā, maṇḍā, karpūra-kūpī

synonyms: ācāryera—of Advaita Ācārya; ei—these; paiḍa—coconut preparation; pānā—sweet rice; sara-pūpī—cakes made with cream; ei—these; amṛta-guṭikā—sweetballs; maṇḍā—a type of round sweetmeat; karpūra-kūpī—a pot of camphor.
translation: "These preparations-paiḍa, sweet rice, cakes made with cream, and also amṛta-guṭikā, maṇḍā and a pot of camphor-have been given by Advaita Ācārya.
